name: Kungfu Warrior Master: Fight Man Free Action Game
name_original: Kungfu Warrior Master: Fight Man Free Action Game
description:
Welcome to KungFu Warrior Master - Jeet Kune Do Game Edition - The best action game.

Our Hero is a famous martial-art legend. He used Wing-Chun and Jeet Kune Do.

The biggest impression of this game are martial-art solo scenes of our Hero. He must fight vs arrogant samurais and giant bosses.

Impressive graphics and sound of game make player exalted. With simple and realism graphics, each move, each action, even jumps whenever attack are ever so slightly. The small size graphic make game running smoothly.

Now download and begin adventure !
